title: Chief adviser pays homage to language heroes
shortDesc: Chief adviser Professor Muhammad Yunus has paid rich tributes to the martyrs of the historic Language Movement, marking the Amar Ekushey and the International Mother Language Day.

title: Government announces new education policy
shortDesc: The government of Bangladesh has introduced a new education policy aimed at improving the quality of education in schools and universities.
description: The new policy focuses on digital learning, teacher training, and curriculum reforms to better equip students for the future.

title: Local elections postponed due to ongoing crisis
shortDesc: Local government elections in several districts have been postponed due to the ongoing political instability.
description: The Election Commission has announced that new dates for the elections will be set once the situation stabilizes.

title: Bangladesh to host South Asian Games 2027
shortDesc: Bangladesh has been selected to host the South Asian Games in 2027, marking a significant milestone in the country's sports history.
description: The government has promised to make the event a major success by improving sports infrastructure and promoting local talent.

title: Technology startups thriving in Dhaka
shortDesc: Dhaka is rapidly emerging as a hub for technology startups, with many young entrepreneurs turning to tech as a career path.
description: With growing investments and a youthful workforce, tech startups are expected to drive the future of Bangladesh's economy.

title: Dhaka streets decorated with murals depicting Language Movement
shortDesc: Artists painted murals and graffiti across Dhaka highlighting the Language Movement.
description: Murals illustrate key moments from 1952, symbolizing national pride and sacrifice.

title: Bangladesh cricket team observes one-minute silence before match
shortDesc: Bangladesh cricket team paid homage to language martyrs before their match in Dhaka.
description: Players wore black armbands and observed silence before the game started.

title: Prime Minister addresses nation on Ekushey February
shortDesc: The Prime Minister delivered a speech emphasizing the significance of the Language Movement.
description: She urged the youth to preserve the spirit of Amar Ekushey and respect linguistic diversity.

title: Poetry recitation held to celebrate International Mother Language Day
shortDesc: Renowned poets recited poems highlighting the struggles and sacrifices of language martyrs.
description: Prominent poets gathered at the National Theatre Hall for an evening of poetry.

title: Bangladesh embassies abroad observe International Mother Language Day
shortDesc: Bangladesh embassies worldwide held programs to honor language martyrs.
description: Embassies arranged discussions, film screenings, and cultural performances.

title: Special musical concert held in memory of language martyrs
shortDesc: A grand musical event featuring patriotic songs was held at the National Stadium.
description: Famous singers performed Amar Ekushey-inspired songs to a packed audience.
